text: Forever Black is the fifth studio album by American heavy metal band Cirith Ungol. The album was released on April 24, 2020, and is the band's first studio album since their reunion in 2016, as well their first studio album since Paradise Lost in 1991. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |+Chart performance for Forever Black |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2020 albums Category:Cirith Ungol albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums
title: Forever Black
